  • java.lang.Object

  • public final class API
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides the top level API for the Transporter plugin.

      • saveAll

        public void saveAll()
        Saves all plugin configurations.

        This method is the equivalent of calling saveConfig and saveGates.

      • saveConfig

        public void saveConfig()
        Saves the main plugin configuration.

        Saves all gate configurations.

      • teleportPlayer

        public void teleportPlayer(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                  LocalGate fromGate)
                    throws ReservationException
        Teleports the specified player as if they stepped into the specified gate.

        This method will return before the teleportation is complete and may not throw an exception even if the teleportation fails, under some circumstances.

        Parameters:
        player - the player to teleport
        fromGate - the gate from which to teleport the player
        Throws:
        ReservationException - if the teleportation cannot be completed

      • teleportPlayer

        public void teleportPlayer(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                  Gate toGate)
                    throws ReservationException
        Teleports the specified player to the specified gate.

        This method will return before the teleportation is complete and may not throw an exception even if the teleportation fails, under some circumstances.

        Parameters:
        player - the player to teleport
        toGate - the destination gate
        Throws:
        ReservationException - if the teleportation cannot be completed

      • teleportPlayer

        public void teleportPlayer(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                  RemoteServer server)
                    throws ReservationException
        Teleports the specified player to the spawn location in the default world on the specified server.

        This method will return before the teleportation is complete and may not throw an exception even if the teleportation fails, under some circumstances.

        Parameters:
        player - the player to teleport
        server - the destination server
        Throws:
        ReservationException - if the teleportation cannot be completed

      • teleportPlayer

        public void teleportPlayer(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                  RemoteWorld world)
                    throws ReservationException
        Teleports the specified player to the spawn location in the specified remote world.

        This method will return before the teleportation is complete and may not throw an exception even if the teleportation fails, under some circumstances.

        Parameters:
        player - the player to teleport
        world - the destination world
        Throws:
        ReservationException - if the teleportation cannot be completed

      • teleportPlayer

        public void teleportPlayer(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                  RemoteLocation location)
                    throws ReservationException
        Teleports the specified player to the specified remote location.

        WARNING: No checks will be performed as to whether the player can safely occupy the specified location. It is completely possible to teleport a player into solid rock.

        This method will return before the teleportation is complete and may not throw an exception even if the teleportation fails, under some circumstances.

        Parameters:
        player - the player to teleport
        location - the destination location
        Throws:
        ReservationException - if the teleportation cannot be completed

      • getRealmName

        public java.lang.String getRealmName()
        Gets the name of the realm this server belongs to.
        Returns:
        the name of the realm
